digits.title: Digit Recognition
digits.b1text: Machine Learning model capable of detecting and recognizing digits from 0 to 9 in images drawn by you

b2text1.api: FastAPI: To set up endpoints and access the model from here

b2text2.c1: The model tries to detect which digit you have drawn

digits.git: You can find all the code in the public repository: https://github.com/dmesmar/digitsCNN
